_metadata.description: Generate and visualize knowledge relationship graphs showing concept connections

requirements.title: Graph generation from vector relationships
requirements.description: Build graph structure by finding semantically similar entries and creating edges based on similarity strength
requirements.notes: Support configurable similarity threshold and max traversal depth

requirements.title: Graph API endpoint
requirements.description: GET /api/v1/knowledge/graph returns nodes and edges in standardized format for visualization
requirements.notes: Support concept-centered graphs and full collection graphs

requirements.title: Graph rendering performance < 2s
requirements.description: Graph generation and rendering for up to 1000 nodes must complete in under 2 seconds
requirements.notes: Limit to 1000 nodes for performance; use filtering for larger graphs

requirements.title: Graph metadata extraction
requirements.description: Extract and include relevant metadata (source, scenario, quality) in graph nodes
requirements.notes: Enable filtering and visualization by metadata properties
